member.summary: Gets the validator.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetMemoryService.CreateRecord(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord)
member.summary: Creates the record.
member.exception: Thrown when record information do not meet the requirements: firstname and lastname length should be in range [2;60], contain not only space symbols, dateofbirth should be in range [01.01.1950;DateTime.Now], grade should be in range [-10;10], height should be in range [0,3m;3m], favouritesymbol can't be a space symbol.
Thrown when firstname or lastname is null.
member.returns: The id of the created record.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetMemoryService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets all the records.
member.returns: The ReadOnlyCollection of all current records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetMemoryService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the records by the firstname.
member.param: The first name to find the records by it.

member.summary: Finds the records by the last name.
member.param: The last name to find the records by it.

member.summary: Finds the records by the date of birth.
member.param: The date of birth to find the records by it.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetMemoryService.EditRecord(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord)
member.summary: Edits the record.
member.exception: Thrown when no record with such id found or when record information do not meet the requirements: firstname and lastname length should be in range [2;60], contain not only space symbols, dateofbirth should be in range [01.01.1950;DateTime.Now], grade should be in range [-10;10], height should be in range [0,3m;3m], favouritesymbol can't be a space symbol.
Thrown when firstname or lastname is null.
